ghost: Whooooa....
goth: you need to back waaay the hell off, dragon-boy. look, he's not dead. 
I'm not into the killing thing. it's the price you to pay to be a 
sharpshooter. You need to drop the whole angsty/searching for redemption 
thing. you killed. tough. get over it. that's what you do sometimes. but 
don't jump on me because you feel guilty about your past. 

--part1_24.20494298.298d61fd_boundary
